mapper.insert: UPSERT INTO user_db.user(id, username, password, create_date) VALUES ( NEXT VALUE FOR user_db.user_seq, #{user.username}, #{user.password}, #{user.createDate})
mapper.select: SELECT id id, username username, password password, create_date createDate FROM user_db.user WHERE username = #{username}
